Import and Export

Import

Help importing from:
  • Outlook Express
  • Outlook 97/98/2000
  • Outlook 2002 (XP)/2003
  • Palm Desktop
  • Netscape Address Book
  • Yahoo! CSV
Warning: Importing data may cause duplication with existing contacts in your address book. You may wish to consider deleting all contacts from your address book.
  1. Choose a program to import contacts from:
  2. Go to that program (application) and export the appropriate records.
    (refer to the Help section on right)
  3. Specify the file to import:
  4. Press Import Now to Import the file:

Export

Choose the program you want to export to and click the corresponding button:

Help exporting to:
  • Outlook Express
  • Outlook 97/98/2000
  • Outlook 2002 (XP)/2003
  • Palm Desktop
  • Netscape Address Book
  • Yahoo! CSV
Warning: Contacts added from Yahoo! Yellow Pages will not be exported.
